page.title: 19LIFE IN A PUB & A RESTAURANT
page.content:
OUR FAMILY HAVE BEEN LIVING AT THE CROWN FOR NEARLY 5 YEARS NOW. I ENJOY LIVING IN THE PUB AND MEETING NEW PEOPLE. IT IS VERY HARD WORK, ESPECIALLY FOR MY MUM AND DAD. I TRY TO HELP THEM AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE. THE BIGGEST SNAG ABOUT LIVING IN A PUB IS THAT I DON'T SEE MUCH OF MY PARENTS BECAUSE THEY ARE ALWAYS WORKING. THE PUB OPENS FROM 10.30a.m.UNTIL 2.30p.m. AND FROM 6p.m.TO 11p.m.
WE HAVE LIVED AT "THE OAKS" FOR ABOUT A YEAR. LIVING IN A RESTAURANT IS DIFFICULT AT TIMES. I SOMETIMES HELP MY PARENTS ON SUNDAYS, SHOWING PEOPLE TO THEIR SEATS AND TAKING ORDERS. MY BROTHER HELPS TO LOAD THE DISHWASHER IN THE KITCHEN. ON MONDAYS WE ARE CLOSED SO WE ALL GO OUT FOR DINNER OR TO THE BEACH. IN SUMMER WE OPEN EVERY DAY AND LIFE IS VERY HECTIC.
